org.apache.giraph.comm

接口 MasterClient

  • 所有已知实现类:
    NettyMasterClient

    public interface MasterClient
    Interface for master to send messages to workers

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void closeConnections()
      Closes all connections.
      void finishSendingAggregatedValues()
      Flush aggregated values cache.
      void flush()
      Flush all outgoing messages.
      void openConnections()
      Make sure that all the connections to workers have been established.
      void sendAggregator(String aggregatorName, Class<? extends Aggregator> aggregatorClass, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable aggregatedValue)
      Sends aggregator to its owner

    • 方法详细资料

      • openConnections

        void openConnections()
        Make sure that all the connections to workers have been established.

      • sendAggregator

        void sendAggregator(String aggregatorName,
                  Class<? extends Aggregator> aggregatorClass,
                  org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable aggregatedValue)
                    throws IOException
        Sends aggregator to its owner
        参数:
        aggregatorName - Name of the aggregator
        aggregatorClass - Class of the aggregator
        aggregatedValue - Value of the aggregator
        抛出:
        IOException

      • finishSendingAggregatedValues

        void finishSendingAggregatedValues()
                                   throws IOException
        Flush aggregated values cache.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • flush

        void flush()
        Flush all outgoing messages. This will synchronously ensure that all messages have been send and delivered prior to returning.

      • closeConnections

        void closeConnections()
        Closes all connections.
